content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Golden Gate Park to Alamo Square: 10.
Golden Gate Park to Presidio: 11.
Golden Gate Park to Russian Hill: 19.
Alamo Square to Golden Gate Park: 9.
Alamo Square to Presidio: 18.
Alamo Square to Russian Hill: 13.
Presidio to Golden Gate Park: 12.
Presidio to Alamo Square: 18.
Presidio to Russian Hill: 14.
Russian Hill to Golden Gate Park: 21.
Russian Hill to Alamo Square: 15.
Russian Hill to Presidio: 14.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Golden Gate Park at 9:00AM. Timothy will be at Alamo Square from 12:00PM to 4:15PM. You'd like to meet Timothy for a minimum of 105 minutes. Mark will be at Presidio from 6:45PM to 9:00PM. You'd like to meet Mark for a minimum of 60 minutes. Joseph will be at Russian Hill from 4:45PM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Joseph for a minimum of 60 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.

SOLUTION: To meet all three friends while adhering to the constraints and minimizing waiting time, the optimal schedule is as follows:

- Start at Golden Gate Park at 9:00 AM and travel to Alamo Square, arriving at 12:00 PM to meet Timothy. Since Timothy is available from 12:00 PM to 4:15 PM and the minimum required meeting time is 105 minutes, meet for the full available period (12:00 PM to 4:15 PM, which is 255 minutes, exceeding the minimum).
- After meeting Timothy, travel from Alamo Square to Russian Hill (13 minutes), arriving at 4:28 PM. Joseph is available from 4:45 PM to 9:30 PM, so wait until 4:45 PM to start the meeting. Meet Joseph for 106 minutes (from 4:45 PM to 6:31 PM), exceeding the 60-minute minimum.
- After meeting Joseph, travel from Russian Hill to Presidio (14 minutes), arriving at 6:45 PM to meet Mark. Mark is available from 6:45 PM to 9:00 PM, so meet for exactly 60 minutes (from 6:45 PM to 7:45 PM).

This schedule ensures all minimum meeting times are met with minimal waiting (only 17 minutes before meeting Joseph). Travel times are accounted for between meetings, but only the meeting actions are included in the itinerary as per the JSON format requirement.

{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "Timothy", "start_time": "12:00PM", "end_time": "4:15PM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Joseph", "start_time": "4:45PM", "end_time": "6:31PM"}, {"action": "meet", "person": "Mark", "start_time": "6:45PM", "end_time": "7:45PM"}]}
